value_claims.claim_title: Accenture developers retain 88% of GitHub Copilot suggested code
value_claims.claim_description: Accenture developers retain over 88% of code suggested by GitHub Copilot as part of their solutions, demonstrating high acceptance and utility of AI-generated code.
value_claims.source_quote: Accenture is one example, its developers now retain over 88% of the code suggested by GitHub Copilot as part of their solutions.
value_claims.attribution_evidence: The metric directly measures the retention rate of AI-generated code suggestions from GitHub Copilot.

value_claims.claim_title: Accenture achieved 84% increase in successful builds with GitHub Copilot
value_claims.claim_description: Accenture recognized an 84% increase in successful builds with GitHub Copilot's assistance, indicating improved code quality and development efficiency.
value_claims.source_quote: They recognized an 84% increase in successful builds with Copilot's help
value_claims.attribution_evidence: The increase in successful builds is directly attributed to GitHub Copilot's assistance in code development.

value_claims.claim_title: 67% of Accenture developers use GitHub Copilot at least five days per week
value_claims.claim_description: 67% of Accenture developers used GitHub Copilot at least five days a week, demonstrating high adoption and regular usage patterns.
value_claims.source_quote: 67% used the tool at least five days a week
value_claims.attribution_evidence: The metric directly measures the frequency of GitHub Copilot usage among developers.

value_claims.claim_title: BNY's Eliza platform supports over 40 AI solutions across operations
value_claims.claim_description: BNY's enterprise AI platform Eliza currently supports over 40 AI solutions, touching almost every part of the bank's operations.
value_claims.source_quote: BNY, America's oldest bank, is driving innovation at the intersection of technology and financial services by harnessing AI solutions like GitHub Copilot and Microsoft 365 Copilot to help transform operations and company culture.
value_claims.attribution_evidence: Eliza is explicitly described as an enterprise AI platform supporting multiple AI solutions across the organization.

value_claims.claim_title: Over 50% of BNY employees regularly use Eliza virtual assistant
value_claims.claim_description: Every BNY employee has access to the Eliza virtual assistant, with more than 50% using it regularly, demonstrating widespread adoption.
value_claims.source_quote: Every bank employee has access to the Eliza virtual assistant, with more than 50% using it regularly and 15% of those proficient enough to build agents of their own.
value_claims.attribution_evidence: The metric directly measures employee adoption and usage of the Eliza AI virtual assistant.

value_claims.claim_title: 15% of BNY employees proficient enough to build their own AI agents
value_claims.claim_description: 15% of BNY employees who use Eliza are proficient enough to build agents of their own, indicating advanced AI literacy and capability development.
value_claims.source_quote: Every bank employee has access to the Eliza virtual assistant, with more than 50% using it regularly and 15% of those proficient enough to build agents of their own.
value_claims.attribution_evidence: The metric measures employee capability to independently create AI agents using the platform.

value_claims.claim_title: Over 80% of BNY developers rely on GitHub Copilot daily
value_claims.claim_description: Having introduced GitHub Copilot in 2024, over 80% of BNY's developer community now relies on it daily, increasing the speed of code development.
value_claims.source_quote: Having introduced GitHub Copilot in 2024, over 80% of their developer community now relies on it daily, increasing the speed of code development.
value_claims.attribution_evidence: The metric directly measures daily adoption of GitHub Copilot among developers with stated impact on development speed.

value_claims.claim_title: BNY AI enables predictive trade analytics for early settlement risk identification
value_claims.claim_description: AI powers predictive trade analytics that enable BNY clients to identify settlement risks early and mitigate late settlements.
value_claims.source_quote: powering predictive trade analytics that enable clients to identify settlement risks early and mitigate late settlements
value_claims.attribution_evidence: AI is explicitly stated as powering the predictive analytics capability for risk identification.

value_claims.claim_title: BNY AI detects anomalies in securities services business
value_claims.claim_description: AI is used to detect anomalies in BNY's securities services business, enhancing risk management and operational integrity.
value_claims.source_quote: The impact of AI can be seen across the organization, from detecting anomalies in their securities services business
value_claims.attribution_evidence: AI is explicitly stated as the technology enabling anomaly detection in securities services.

value_claims.claim_title: Nasdaq Boardvantage AI saves customers over 100 hours annually
value_claims.claim_description: The integration of AI in Nasdaq Boardvantage enables customers to potentially save more than 100 hours of manual work each year through automated document management and summarization.
value_claims.source_quote: The integration of AI not only enables customers to potentially save more than 100 hours of manual work each year
value_claims.attribution_evidence: AI-powered automation in document management and summarization directly enables the time savings.

value_claims.claim_title: Nasdaq Boardvantage AI achieves 91-97% accuracy in summarization
value_claims.claim_description: Nasdaq Boardvantage AI-powered summarization delivers accuracy range of 91% to 97%, allowing users to deliver high-quality outputs that exceed generic summarization models.
value_claims.source_quote: it's accuracy range of 91% to 97% allows users to deliver high-quality outputs that exceed generic summarization models
value_claims.attribution_evidence: The accuracy metric directly measures the performance of AI-powered summarization functionality.

value_claims.claim_description: Over 70,000 organizations are using GitHub Copilot today to supercharge the productivity of their developers.
value_claims.source_quote: Over 70,000 organizations are using GitHub Copilot today to supercharge the productivity of their developers.
value_claims.attribution_evidence: The metric directly measures organizational adoption of GitHub Copilot for developer productivity enhancement.
